name: Lust Dungeon
description:
Lust Dungeon is a lesbian roguelike deckbuilder game where you must save your loved one from a deep dungeon full of dick monsters. Collect cards to build powerful decks and defeat your enemies! With each run, you'll get closer to freeing Korin, but the dungeon is full of dangerous creatures that will test your skills. Can you defeat them all and save the one you love?

Features:

* A trusted deckbuilding gameplay experience - remember Slay the Spire? Think sexier and naughtier!
* Many cards to collect.
* Deadly creatures with gigantic penises to battle! They don't care that Lux is a lesbian, and will use their giant dicks to fight back.
* A challenging roguelike progression where progress isn't spared when you lose.
* Beautiful CG girls!
* Ugly monsters with penises that are not afraid to use them.

Gameplay:

* Fight your way through layers of monsters in a procedurally generated dungeon.
* Collect cards to build powerful decks
* Dive into the unknown when choosing the random map node
* Rescue your loved one from the clutches of evil before they forget all about lesbian values!
* Turn based play where you must consider your mana and play your cards wisely.
* Randomly generated map with random encounters.

The game is played like a traditional turn-based card game, each turn you get some cards and you have to decide which ones to play before you end your turn. You are trying to eliminate the enemies and progress your way through the map in order to reach the top. You will build your deck along the way and choose which cards to keep. You will also read the love story of Lux and Korin and see sexy images with both of them.

Juicy renders await you!
